com.paypal.merchant.sdk.domain

Interface EMVDeviceData


  • public interface EMVDeviceData
    This interface provides all the necessary information about the EMV device that is connected with the SDK.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CardReaderListener.EMVConnectionStatus getConnectionStatus()
      The connection status of the EMV device such as Connected, MandatoryUpdate etc.
      java.lang.String getDeviceName()
      The name of the connected EMV device.
      java.lang.String getFirmwareVersion()
      Firmware version of the connected EMV device.
      int getLastKnownBatteryLevel()
      The last known battery level of the connected EMV device.
      java.lang.String getOSVersion()
      OS version of the connected EMV device.
      java.lang.String getSerialNumber()
      Serial number version of the connected EMV device.

    • Method Detail

      • getOSVersion

        java.lang.String getOSVersion()
        OS version of the connected EMV device.
        Returns:
        : A string representation of the OS version.

      • getFirmwareVersion

        java.lang.String getFirmwareVersion()
        Firmware version of the connected EMV device.
        Returns:
        : A String representation of the firmware version.

      • getSerialNumber

        java.lang.String getSerialNumber()
        Serial number version of the connected EMV device.
        Returns:
        : A String representation of the serial number.

      • getDeviceName

        java.lang.String getDeviceName()
        The name of the connected EMV device.
        Returns:
        : A String device name.

      • getLastKnownBatteryLevel

        int getLastKnownBatteryLevel()
        The last known battery level of the connected EMV device. This value is updated every time the getBatteryLevel() API from the CardReaderManager is called.
        Returns:
        : An integer representing the last recorded battery level.

      • getConnectionStatus

        CardReaderListener.EMVConnectionStatus getConnectionStatus()
        The connection status of the EMV device such as Connected, MandatoryUpdate etc.
        Returns:
        : A EMVConnectionStatus object indicating the connection status.
